answers.answer: Hello.Yes, type 1 diabetes mellitus is associated with multiple white matter lesions. There are a few studies which mention that type 1 diabetes patients have regions of lesser dense grey matter also.Both ways, the correlation is there. And it's a cause and effect association.Regards
What does this mean, in terms of brain functionality?

question: Is there any corralation between Type 1 diabetes and multiple white brain lesions?
title: White brain lesions & Type 1 diabetes
